HERO.TITLE: The sticky notes library
HERO.DESCRIPTION: Post It is a React library that allows you to create and manage sticky notes easily and in a customizable way. It simplifies the creation of interactive user interfaces with notes that can be moved, edited, customized, and deleted effortlessly.

USAGE.TITLE: How to use it?
USAGE.DESCRIPTION: To start using Post-It, follow these steps:
USAGE.SINGLE_DESCRIPTION: Ideal for when you want to use a defined number of Post Its.
USAGE.LIST_DESCRIPTION: Ideal for when you want to use an "unlimited" number of Post Its and manage them in a list (React state).

ACTIONS.TITLE: Interactive actions
ACTIONS.DESCRIPTION: Post-It allows you to perform the following optional actions with your sticky notes.

DISABLE.TITLE: Disable actions
DISABLE.DESCRIPTION: You can disable the actions of moving, editing, and deleting sticky notes.

STYLES.TITLE: Other styles...
STYLES.DESCRIPTION: There are other types of Post Its with predefined styles.

TABLE.TITLE: Property guide
TABLE.DESCRIPTION: Here are all the properties that each Post It accepts.

CODE.DOUBLE_CLICK: Double-click to create a Post It
